mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE(SEQ_MOVIE, POSTER, POSTER2, TITLE, RATE, AGE, GENRE, COUNTRY, RUNNINGTIME, CREATED, DIRECTOR, ACTOR, TRAILER, STORY) VALUES(SEQ_MOVIE.NEXTVAL, #{poster}, #{poster2}, #{title}, #{rate}, #{age}, #{genre}, #{country}, #{runningtime}, #{created}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{trailer}, #{story})
